intro:
The Sonic Racing: CrossWorlds – Open Network Test is available now!

Race with players from around the world during this limited free-to-play period!

Open Network Test:
United States (PST) Thurs, Aug. 28, 9:00 p.m. to Mon, Sept. 1, 9:00 p.m.
United Kingdom (UTC) Fri, Aug. 29, 4:00 a.m. to Tues, Sept. 2, 4:00 a.m.
Japan (JST) Fri, Aug. 29, 1:00 p.m. to Tues, Sept. 2, 1:00 p.m.

Content included in the Open Network Test

• World Match – Online Mode (Days 1-2, 4): Compete against 11 other players and rank up! Squads will also be available during this period.
• Festival – Online Mode (Day 3): Try racing as Joker during the Joker Festival Event, where players are split into teams of 3 to compete for points. The team with the most points at the end of the Festival earns rewards!
• Grand Prix – Offline Mode: Go for gold in the Donpa Grand Prix!
• Time Trial – Offline Mode: Race for the best time in 1 of 3 tracks from the Donpa Grand Prix!

All players who participate in the Open Network Test will receive an exclusive Decal and Title for their vehicles when the full game launches.

Please note:
• Local split-screen multiplayer is not supported on the Open Network Test.
• Save data will not carry over to the full game.

For more information, please see: https://RaceCrossWorlds.com/
